Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial project setup for Droid Automator

- Android project with Gradle Kotlin DSL and version catalog
- Jetpack Compose UI with Material 3 and dynamic colors
- Hilt dependency injection
- Room database with entities for automations and logs
- Domain layer with extensible Trigger/Action sealed classes
- AutomationEngine for processing notification triggers
- NotificationListenerService for capturing notifications
- MVVM architecture with ViewModels and StateFlow
- Complete UI: Home, Editor, Logs, and Settings screens
- Documentation in /docs folder

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Fix Compose compiler configuration for Kotlin 1.9.x

The kotlin.compose plugin is only available in Kotlin 2.0+. For Kotlin
1.9.x, the Compose compiler version must be configured via composeOptions
in the android block instead.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
